types.name: Root

actions.name: configure

params.name: token
params.description: API access token for authenticating with the Pinecone service.

params.name: environment
params.description: The Pinecone environment to connect to ('default' if not specified).

actions.description: Configures the Pinecone connection with a provided API token and optional environment setting.

fields.name: status
fields.description: The current status of the Pinecone service connection.

fields.name: tests
fields.description: A set of test utilities for the Pinecone indexes.

types.description: Manages interactions with the Pinecone database service.

types.name: Index

fields.name: database
fields.description: Reference to the associated Pinecone Database.

fields.name: status
fields.description: Current status of the Index in the Pinecone database.

actions.name: query

params.name: namespace
params.description: The namespace to which the query is scoped.

params.name: id
params.description: Unique identifier for a specific entry within the namespace.

params.name: top_k
params.description: The number of top matching vectors to return.

params.name: includeValues
params.description: Specifies whether to include the values of the vectors in the response.

params.name: includeMetadata
params.description: Specifies whether to include metadata for the vectors in the response.

params.name: vector
params.description: The vector to be used for the query.

params.name: filter
params.description: The filter to apply to the query results.

params.name: sparceVector
params.description: The sparse vector format used to represent vectors with a lot of zero values.

actions.description: Executes a query against a Pinecone Index and retrieves matching entries.

actions.name: upsert

params.name: namespace
params.description: The namespace within the Index where vectors will be inserted or updated.

params.name: vectors
params.description: A JSON string containing the vectors to insert or update.

actions.description: Inserts or updates vectors in the Pinecone Index.

types.description: Represents an Index in Pinecone database.

fields.name: name
fields.description: The name assigned to the Pinecone database.

fields.name: metric
fields.description: The metric type used for vector search within the database.

fields.name: dimension
fields.description: The number of dimensions for the vectors indexed in the database.

fields.name: replicas
fields.description: The number of replicas of the database for high availability.

fields.name: shards
fields.description: The number of shards to distribute the database index across.

fields.name: pods
fields.description: The number of pods allocated for the database in a Kubernetes environment.

fields.name: pod_type
fields.description: The type of pods used by the Pinecone database service.

types.name: Status

fields.name: waiting
fields.description: List of operations that are pending execution.

fields.name: crashed
fields.description: List of operations that have encountered errors and stopped unexpectedly.

fields.name: host
fields.description: The host address of the Pinecone service.

fields.name: port
fields.description: The port number on which the Pinecone service is available.

fields.name: state
fields.description: The current state of the Pinecone service, such as 'running' or 'stopped'.

fields.name: ready
fields.description: Boolean flag indicating whether the Pinecone service is ready to process requests.

types.description: Represents the current status and operational information of the Pinecone service.
